topic.title: 问下你们最近的I2P还能用吗？
topic.body:
我可以扫到节点，但是就是不能代理。
说中文会被删贴吗，0网也可以删贴？只让用英语是不是会挡住多数同胞，还谈什么壮大？

3_1NnThhNZHqenY4WqzEqsqVbveA5pr9vTeF.body: 专家指出 专家强调  专家介绍 专家还提示  专家表示

2_1K3XuSDK5W2S6kXq2jVBVi42Kvp7o59rC9.body: 不要再钓鱼了，本来人就不多。

1_15LYZz82LwdFA4tqWVgv3zJ8ZsWam784VV.body:
Statement is not very ah, but for the use of Google translation?
语句不 是很通啊，要不是用的谷歌翻译？

9_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY.body: 请问怎么屏蔽某人发的帖子？

> [superman1993](#comment_1_17xFNeY3nVe4VRNzudA5Hg3PhUuCmq2bfR): 屏蔽人的方法：http://127.0.0.1:43110/NewGFWTalk.bit/?Topic:23_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ/+ZeroNet+Android+APK+ZeroMe+http+127+0+0+1+43110+NewGFWtalk+bit+NewGFWtalk+bit+surf
十分感谢。

2_1MPTXu5zUeKZ4WqVmcMQUUp6zAtLN3JyAi.body: 我初中第一节微机课时，老师就告诉我们，打开网址时后面的数字是可以不要的。比如http://cn.gtc.la/Home/a

> [aac](#comment_19_1Np58q7bCfW7hmHuXvoYux3ij6M4Qecfb3): http://cn.gtc.la    这个也可以打开

Am I right？嘿嘿

1_1GhYpibzrzQ9FZTeoeHxG297hgcqcv71X2.body: Did you think here are too many Chinese?

101_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nwkTkKv.body: what is the message when you run it , I used Raspbian, is no problem.
IN config.txt ,hdmi_drive 1 is DVI OUT，2 is hdmi OUT。You can reference this https://www.raspberrypi.org/documentation/configuration/config-txt/video.md

I know a blog,It's good. You can see it!
https://space.bilibili.com/149984352#!/video

1509056504_1AL7MPy6rvULDRvLbmsxttSQALdYF.body: This is the best,I hope everyone can see it.    https://prism-break.org/en/
